jobActions.name: Fast Blade
jobActions.description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.

jobActions.name: Fight or Flight
jobActions.description:
Increases damage dealt by 25%.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Riot Blade
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Fast Blade
Combo Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Restores MP

jobActions.name: Total Eclipse
jobActions.description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.

jobActions.name: Shield Bash
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 6s

jobActions.name: Iron Will
jobActions.description:
Significantly increases enmity generation.
Effect ends upon reuse.

jobActions.name: Release Iron Will
jobActions.description: Cancels the effect of Iron Will.

jobActions.name: Shield Lob
jobActions.description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity

jobActions.name: Rage of Halone
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Combo Action: Riot Blade
Combo Potency: 330

jobActions.name: Spirits Within
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 270.
Additional Effect: Restores MP

jobActions.name: Sheltron
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 15%.
Duration: 6s
Oath Gauge Cost: 50

jobActions.name: Sentinel
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 30%.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Prominence
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Total Eclipse
Combo Potency: 170
Combo Bonus: Restores MP
Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might
Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Cover
jobActions.description:
Take all damage intended for another party member as long as said member remains within 10 yalms.
Does not activate with certain attacks.
Duration: 12s
Oath Gauge Cost: 50

jobActions.name: Circle of Scorn
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Damage over time
Potency: 30
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Hallowed Ground
jobActions.description:
Renders you impervious to most attacks.
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Bulwark
jobActions.description:
Block incoming attacks.
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Goring Blade
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 700.
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

jobActions.name: Divine Veil
jobActions.description:
Creates a barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage equivalent to 10% of your maximum HP.
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Restores target's HP
Cure Potency: 400

jobActions.name: Clemency
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 1,000
Additional Effect: Restores to self 50% of HP restored to target if target is a party member

jobActions.name: Royal Authority
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Riot Blade
Combo Potency: 400
Combo Bonus: Grants 3 stacks of Sword Oath
Duration: 30s
Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might
Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Intervention
jobActions.description:
Reduces target party member's damage taken by 10%.
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: Increases damage reduction by an additional 10% if Rampart or Sentinel are active
Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Resolve to target
Knight's Resolve Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Benediction to target
Knight's Benediction Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 250
Duration: 12s
Oath Gauge Cost: 50

jobActions.name: Holy Spirit
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 350.
Divine Might Potency: 450
Requiescat Potency: 650
The effect of Divine Might will be prioritized over Requiescat when under the effect of both.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

jobActions.name: Requiescat
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 300.
Additional Effect: Grants 4 stacks of Requiescat
Requiescat Effect: Increases the potency of Holy Spirit,Â Holy Circle, and all Confiteor combo actions and spells will require no cast time
Additional Effect: Grants Confiteor Ready
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Passage of Arms
jobActions.description:
Increases block rate to 100% and creates a designated area in a cone behind you in which party members will only suffer 85% of all damage inflicted.
Duration: 18s
Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

jobActions.name: Holy Circle
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Divine Might Potency: 200
Requiescat Potency: 300
The effect of Divine Might will be prioritized over Requiescat when under the effect of both.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

jobActions.name: Intervene
jobActions.description:
Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 150.
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Atonement
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 400.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Sword Oath.

jobActions.name: Confiteor
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 400 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Requiescat Potency: 900
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400
Can only be executed while under the effect of Confiteor Ready. Effect fades upon execution.

jobActions.name: Holy Sheltron
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 15%.
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Resolve
Knight's Resolve Effect: Reduces damage taken by 15%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Benediction
Knight's Benediction Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 250
Duration: 12s
Oath Gauge Cost: 50

jobActions.name: Expiacion
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 450 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores MP

jobActions.name: Blade of Faith
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 200 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Requiescat Potency: 700
Combo Action: Confiteor
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

â»This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Blade of Truth
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 300 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Requiescat Potency: 800
Combo Action: Blade of Faith
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

â»This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Blade of Valor
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 400 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Requiescat Potency: 900
Combo Action: Blade of Truth
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

â»This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

roleActions.name: Provoke
roleActions.description: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.

roleActions.name: Interject
roleActions.description: Interrupts the use of a target's action.

roleActions.name: Reprisal
roleActions.description:
Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Arm's Length
roleActions.description:
Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck
Duration: 15s

roleActions.name: Shirk
roleActions.description: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.

traits.name: Tank Mastery
traits.description: Reduces damage taken by 20%. Furthermore, grants a bonus to maximum HP based on your vitality attribute, and a bonus to damage dealt based on your strength attribute.

traits.name: Oath Mastery
traits.description: Increases Oath Gauge by 5 each time an auto-attack lands.

traits.name: Chivalry
traits.description: Restores MP when using Riot Blade or Spirits Within.

traits.name: Rage of Halone Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Rage of Halone to Royal Authority.

traits.name: Divine Magic Mastery
traits.description:
Halves MP cost for all spells while preventing casting interruptions via damage taken. Grants the following effects after successfully completing a combo with Royal Authority:
Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might
Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Enhanced Prominence
traits.description:
Grants the following effects after successfully completing a combo with Prominence:
Combo Bonus: Restores MP
Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might
Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Enhanced Sheltron
traits.description: Extends the duration of Sheltron to 6 seconds.

traits.name: Sword Oath
traits.description:
Grants three stacks of Sword Oath after successfully completing a combo with Royal Authority.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Enhanced Requiescat
traits.description:
Grants the effect of Confiteor Ready upon landing Requiescat.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Enhanced Intervention
traits.description:
Extends the duration of Intervention to 8 seconds.
Grants Knight's Resolve to target, reducing damage taken by 10%.
Duration: 4s
Grants Knight's Benediction to target, gradually restoring HP over time.
Cure Potency: 250
Duration: 12s

traits.name: Divine Magic Mastery II
traits.description:
Adds a healing effect to Holy Spirit, Holy Circle, and Confiteor.
Cure Potency: 400

traits.name: Melee Mastery
traits.description: Increases the potency of Fast Blade to 200, Riot Blade to 140, Royal Authority to 140, Holy Spirit to 350, and Atonement to 400.

traits.name: Enhanced Divine Veil
traits.description:
Adds a healing effect to Divine Veil.
Cure Potency: 400
